name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs with salt. Pour eggs into pan and stir until solid. Optionally serve with pepper, cheese, or ketchup

name: Sunny Side Eggs
instructions: Crack the egg into a pan with oil. Pan fry for 2-3 minutes until whites are set

name: Soft Boiled Eggs
instructions: Boil eggs in salted water for 7 mins. Soak in cold water to stop the cooking process. Crack all sides, then peel under the membrane. Optionally serve with soy sauce

name: Poached Eggs
instructions: Crack egg into a cup. Bring salted water to a simmer and create a vortex. Gently pour egg in and maintain the vortex. Simmer for 3-4 minutes until whites are set

name: Bacon
instructions: Pan fry each side until light brown (~1 min)

name: Sausage
instructions: Parboil with cold water measured half the height of the sausage (~7 mins). Flip halfway through to boil both sides. Pan fry with oil on both sides until golden brown

name: Toast
instructions: Toast each side until golden brown (~45 secs). Optionally serve with butter or jam

name: Breakfast Skillet
ingredients: Meat, potatoes, onions, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, eggs, shredded cheese, green onions
instructions: Cook meat of choice separately. Prepare homefries, then add meat back in, make wells for eggs, and crack eggs into them. Sprinkle with cheese and green onions. Cook until eggs are set.

name: Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: Tortilla, Eggs, Salt, Sausage, Shredded Cheese
instructions: Cook {Scrambled Eggs}. Cook ground sausage until browned. Put everything plus cheese into the tortilla and roll it up. Toast both sides of the burrito in a pan until golden brown, optionally with more cheese. Optionally serve with {Home Fries} or onions
